Package polyglot.ast

Interface Stmt

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Copy<Node>, Node, NodeOps, java.io.Serializable, Term
All Known Subinterfaces:
Assert, Block, Branch, Case, Catch, CompoundStmt, ConstructorCall, Do, Empty, Eval, ExtendedFor, For, ForInit, ForUpdate, If, Labeled, LocalClassDecl, LocalDecl, Loop, MultiCatch, Return, Switch, SwitchBlock, SwitchElement, Synchronized, Throw, Try, TryWithResources, While
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBlock_c, Assert_c, Block_c, Branch_c, Case_c, Catch_c, ConstructorCall_c, Do_c, Empty_c, Eval_c, ExtendedFor_c, For_c, If_c, Labeled_c, LocalClassDecl_c, LocalDecl_c, Loop_c, Loop.Instance, MultiCatch_c, Return_c, Stmt_c, Switch_c, SwitchBlock_c, Synchronized_c, Throw_c, Try_c, TryWithResources_c, While_c
public interface Stmt
extends Term
A Stmt represents any Java statement. All statements must be subtypes of Stmt.
